1.text: Hear, ye sons, the instruction of a father, and attend to know understanding.

2.text: For I gave to you good instruction; ye shall not forsake my law.

3.text: For I was son to my father; tender and only before the face of my mother.

4.text: And he taught me, and he will say to me, Thy heart shall hold fast my words: watch my commands and live.

5.text: Obtain wisdom, obtain understanding: thou shalt not forget, and thou shalt not decline from the words of my mouth.

6.text: Thou shalt not forsake her, and she will watch thee: love her, and she will guard thee.

7.text: Wisdom the beginning; obtain wisdom, and with all thine acquisition, obtain understanding.

8.text: Lift her up and she shall exalt thee: she will honor thee when thou shalt embrace her.

9.text: She will give to thy head a garland of grace: a crown of glory she will deliver thee.

10.text: Hear, my son, and receive my words, and the years of life shall be multiplied to thee.

11.text: In the way of wisdom I taught thee; I caused thee to tread in the tracks of uprightness.

12.text: In thy going, thy steps shall not be pressed; and if thou shalt run thou shalt not be weak.

13.text: Lay hold upon instruction, thou shalt not let go: guard her for she is thy life.

14.text: In the path of the unjust thou shalt not go, and thou shalt not advance in the way of the wicked.

15.text: Reject it, thou shalt not pass in it; turn aside from it and pass by.

16.text: For they slept not, if they shall not do evil; and their sleep was taken away, if they shall not cause to falter.

17.text: For they ate the bread of injustice, and they will drink the wine of violences:

18.text: The path of the just as the light shining, going and shining even to the day prepared.

19.text: The way of the unjust as darkness: they shall not know in what they shall stumble.

20.text: My son, attend to my word; incline thine ear to my sayings.

21.text: They shall not turn aside from thine eyes; watch them in the midst of thy heart.

22.text: For they are life to those finding them, and healing to all their flesh.

23.text: Guard thy heart with all watching, for from it the goings forth of life.

24.text: Turn away from thee perverseness of mouth, and frowardness of lips remove far oft from thee.

25.text: Thine eyes shall look straight before, and thine eyelashes shall be right before thee.

26.text: Make level the track of thy feet, and all thy ways shall be prepared.

27.text: Thou shalt not decline to the right and the left: turn away thy foot from evil.
